name: Ruyi Bang
skill: Deals 1849/2269 DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
ability: Normal attacks have a slight chance of inflicting Stun.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a staff that can expand and contract at the will of its owner. She's famous for being the favorite weapon of Sun Wukong, but she never liked how he always got all the attention, so now she set out to make a name for herself and started entering regional contests. They always introduced her as Sun Wukong's "toy," which makes her really angry, but this anger is what motivates her to keep training hard every day.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 15/02/2017.
◦ In the summon announcement she was introduced as Jingu Bang.

main: "I bet YOUR staff can't do this!"
skill: "You won't find a more talented staff wielder in the world!"
summon: "Most of what he accomplished is thanks to my power!"
limit_break: "Now I'll finally be more powerful than him!"
